column4: This is Ubuntu-support, I know, but I have set up a Samba-share to allow my neighbours access to TV-shows and movies. Problem is, how do I connect to it from Windows? I used Webmin to set it up, with a setting of allowing everybody access, but Windows says it can't find it, or that the user may not have permissions to access it.
do you use IP adresses to connect?
the share is three 1TB discs in LVM array, mounted to \home\ottiserver\share
